name: 3D Effect
description: With a strong sense of three-dimensionality or 3D modeling presentation, the visual impact is stronger.

name: High Difficulty
description: The screen fragments are complex, with rich details, requiring higher patience and observational skills from players.

name: Child-Friendly
description: With bright colors, simple elements, and safety, it is suitable for young children's puzzle enlightenment.

name: Popular Elements
description: Combining current hot topics, trends, or internet memes, etc., to attract attention.

name: Retro Style
description: With an ancient painting or old photo effect, it creates a nostalgic and historical feel.

name: Hand-Drawn Style
description: Emphasizing hand-drawn lines or illustration textures, rich in artistic atmosphere.

name: Digital Collage
description: Composing fantastical composite effects by combining multiple images or materials.

name: Large Scene
description: With a broad view, many elements, and a panoramic shocking experience.

name: Fresh and Clean
description: With a fresh and soft color tone, the picture is fresh, giving people a calm and comfortable feeling.

name: Rich Details
description: With many small elements, requiring careful distinction and assembly.

name: High Saturation
description: With bright and vibrant colors, strong contrast, and extreme visual impact.

name: Dark Fantasy
description: With an overall dark or Gothic atmosphere, mystery and depth coexist.

name: Dreamy
description: With halos, soft colors, etc., creating a dreamy and fantastical visual experience.

name: Real Photography
description: Using real scene photos, preserving the original flavor and details of light and shadow.

name: Composite Art
description: With multiple scenes or materials overlapping, full of creativity and imagination.

name: Minimalist
description: With extremely simplified picture elements and colors, highlighting simplicity and high-end feel.

name: Colorful
description: With multiple colors used, lively and memorable, making people unforgettable.

name: Classical Flavor
description: Integrating traditional cultural or historical elements, exuding classical beauty and cultural heritage.

name: Creative Abundance
description: With novel themes or expression methods, bringing unexpected surprises.

name: Alternative Vision
description: Using unconventional perspectives or special light and shadow processing, creating unique visual experiences.

name: Streamlined Design
description: With smooth picture lines, full of dynamic and modern feel.

name: Montage
description: Composing jump-cut artistic effects by combining multiple different scenes or elements.

name: Surreal
description: Breaking physical or logical limits, creating an extraordinary visual experience beyond the ordinary.

name: Cute Cartoon
description: With Q-version or cartoon-style representation, the overall atmosphere is light and lively.
